title: mystery chest
body: if i buy the mystery chest is there have chance to get soulstealer vayne?

replies.body:
Zombiemaster is correct, you definitely won't be able to get Soulstealer Vayne through a mystery chest. However, you *are* able to get her through Hextech Crafting by collecting 10 gemstones and crafting the skin. Here's a link to our complete [Hextech Crafting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide). 

Let me know if you have any questions!
It's also possible to get the Shard Skin directly in addition of the Gemstone way. But in both case you need to open **Hextech** Chests, not Mystery Chests.
Correct, I accidentally left that out. Thanks for clearing that up!
Nope. Mystery gifts/chests will only give skins that are available in the store, or Legacy skins that were at one point in the store.
